meanings.definition: The quality or condition of being ordinary or commonplace.
meanings.sent1: The everydaynesses of the situation made it easy to overlook.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate the everydaynesses of my morning routine.
meanings.sent3: The magic show lost its charm due to the everydaynesses of the tricks.
meanings.sent4: Her poetry captures the beauty hidden within everydaynesses.
meanings.sent5: The artist found inspiration in the everydaynesses of city life.

meanings.definition: The state of being part of daily life or routine.
meanings.sent1: We often take for granted the everydaynesses of our surroundings.
meanings.sent2: The everydaynesses of cooking dinner can be comforting.
meanings.sent3: The cat's curiosity turned the everydaynesses of the house into an adventure.
meanings.sent4: His music reflects the everydaynesses of suburban living.
meanings.sent5: The novel explores the hidden depths of everydaynesses.
